## asciiDirectoryTree() function

Generates an ASCII string representation of a directory tree.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function asciiDirectoryTree(path: string, rootName?: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  path | string | Path to the directory tree to print as ASCII string. |
|  rootName | string |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

string

The generated string representation of the tree.
